entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance Throwing InvalidOperationException in .NET 8 #94736
  • Test failure - System.NullReferenceException in System.Threading.Lock.TryInitializeStatics #94728
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `Volatile.(Read|Write)Enum` #94727
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36558: .NET Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability #94726
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36049: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #94725
  • c++/cli compile error 3611 if System::IntPtr is used #94723
  • XUnitLogChecker: Enable for NativeAOT tests #94722
  • XUnitLogChecker: Frames are sometimes unresolved #94721
  • XUnitLogChecker: In OSX, no dumps are being found in the /cores directory #94720
  • [Feature Request] Capture app command line information in ELF dumps #94714
    9.0.0
  • [Performance] String.IndexOf(StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) regressed 20% in .NET 8 #94713
  • DateTimeOffset.Now throws exception on Android with Arabic language & western hemisphere timezone #94709
    8.0.x
  • File uploader crashes app on iOS when "use device camera" is used instead of "photo library". #94698
  • [API Proposal]: Expose bound configuration sections (so it is possible to generate a JSON schema for appsettings.json) #94697
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 6 Regressions on 11/12/2023 8:47:21 PM #94724
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 9 Regressions on 11/9/2023 1:06:12 AM #94717
  • Test failure _ParallelCrashTester::ParallelCrashTester.ParallelCrashWorkerThreads() #94687

Closed

  • Reflection fails when working with struct implementing interface that implements inherited static abstract members #94543
  • Brotli no longer allows casting integer as a CompressionLevel (.NET 6 -> .NET 7) #94734
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.RSAKeyFileTests.NoFuzzyPkcs8 #84601
    Future
  • .NET runtime crashes sometimes during stack unwinding on Linux arm64 #92408
    Future
  • Congratulations on the release of .net 8 #94702
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort not working on linux-musl-arm64 #63187
    Future
  • Update `SystemNative_AlignedAlloc` to properly check `aligned_alloc` availability for Apple targets #54296
    Future
  • [mono] Deadlock on TypeInitializationLock in mono_runtime_class_init_full #93778
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Compare perf for OpenSSL 1.1 vs OpenSSL 3+ MsQuic versions on a same machine #86516
    9.0.0
  • Consider enabling EnforceCodeStyleInBuild in runtime to validate IDE rules on build #94658
  • Add some grouping in output for listing runtimes and sdks #3067
    Future
  • Enable "Hacking Mode" for host #2625
    Future
  • The dotnet host should respect a RID graph from an app's .deps.json #2663
    Future
  • Usability Issues in HttpClient #94471
    9.0.0
  • Add API for detecting broken pipe when write to stdout(or stderr) #30540
    Future
  • Setting Console.CursorVisible property does not change visibility in Linux #31063
    Future
  • Console issues with multithreaded c# app only when run on Linux #49301
    Future
  • Proposal: Make Console.Input/OutputEncoding default to UTF-16 on Windows #70168
    Future
  • Console.Write(<character>) behaves differently depending on which terminal (and said terminal's settings) is being used. #76825
    Future
  • Test failure ConsoleEncoding.TestEncoding #85772
    Future
  • How can i get the filed "m_length" of "ILGenerator" ? #94662
  • Enable Type equivalence caching for collectible types #11577
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasi] Run the mono runtime component selection logic for wasi #94738
    area-Build-mono
  • Add etw event for Monitor.Wait #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add DynamicHelpers to riscv64 stubs #94735
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Allow spmi collection of altjit compiles #94733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ConstructorBuilder implementation, integrate TypeBuilder.GetXyz() static methods #94732
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #94731
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #94730
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #94729
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/7.0-staging] [main] Fixed DateTimeOffset.Now calls on Android with specific conditions #94719
    Servicing-consider, os-android, area-System.DateTime
  • [release/8.0-staging] [main] Fixed DateTimeOffset.Now calls on Android with specific conditions #94718
    Servicing-consider, os-android, area-System.DateTime
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update APICompat baseline version to 8.0.0 #94716
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] #ifdef out code that requires FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE #94715
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Implement emulate single step feature. #94711
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [main] Fixed DateTimeOffset.Now calls on Android with specific conditions #94710
    os-android, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94708
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94707
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94706
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 6.0.x
  • [NO MERGE][mono] imt vt_slot robustness #94705
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Optimize data flow used in assertion prop/CSE #94701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extract common CodeAnalysis rules into separate file #94696
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do not generate broken debug info for non-methods #94693
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: enable cross-block local assertion prop #94689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Improve message when wasi-sdk is missing #94688
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Make Deflate/GZip/ZlibStream empty writes have the same impact as no writes #94433
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add missing readonly modifiers to GCHandle and DependentHandle #93178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Revert performance optimization resulting in incorrect lookups in certain case insensitive frozen collections #94685
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 8.0.x
  • Update APICompat baseline version to 8.0.0 #94712
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add document listing supported feature checks #94440
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: consistently handle no return calls in qmarks #94690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try to unbreak nativeaot outerloop legs #94692
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mention "native" instruction set in the docs #94695
    documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Filter out a few more phi args in VN #94699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle null signature destinations for ECDsa / DSA / RSA #93996
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Emit exception blocks for the new ILGenerator #94366
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [wasm] Enable WasmStripILAfterAOT by default #94682
    area-Build-mono
  • add IO.Ports packaging for linux-musl #92145
    area-System.IO.Ports
  • Enable aligned_alloc on macOS #94298
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, os-ios
  • [release/7.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94573
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93943
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • Expose ChannelReader.ReadAllAsync from non-core builds as well #94417
    area-System.Threading.Channels
  • Delete .editorconfig for AOT projects #94694
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update test build group boundaries to today test distribution #93575
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #94492
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow

Updated

  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono-debug] refactor access to MonoDebugInformationEnc #94617
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • try regMask to unsigned __int128 for linux/arm64 #94589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Added PowerShell.Benchmarks to SuperPMI collections #93493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Update Marshal.QueryInterface() argument modifier (take 2) #94470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Calculate PackageVersionNet7 #94614
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Merge CodeGenBringUpTests projects #94122
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Console.Unix: for echoing, write back to the terminal instead of writing to Console.Out. #94414
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #94370
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add feature switch attribute design doc #94625
    linkable-framework
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94193
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Arm64/SVE: Add Uzp1 #94529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm64-sve
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Format usings to match code style #94085
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Clean up NYI_RISCV64 in CodeGen and Emitter #94666
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/6.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94577
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.x
  • Enumerable.ToArray performance improvement using InlineArray #90459
    area-System.Collections, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix for a stress crash in ComAwareWeakReferenceNative::HasInteropInfo #94649
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Optimize SSA #94672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add support for specifying "experiment name". #94679
    tenet-performance-benchmarks, area-Infrastructure
  • Update NugetProjectModelVersion and NugetPackagingVersion #94613
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Introduce VectorXXX.GetMatchCount and VectorXXX.IndexOfFirstMatch helper methods to ensure optimal codegen for ARM64 and unrolled fallback paths #94472
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
